infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysAndWhenInUseUsageDescrip: Bubbles shares your location with your partner so you can stay connected throughout the day.
infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: Bubbles needs your location to share it with your partner.
infoPlist.NSMotionUsageDescription: Bubbles tracks your activity to share fitness data with your partner.
infoPlist.NSHealthShareUsageDescription: Bubbles shares your health and fitness data with your partner.
infoPlist.NSHealthUpdateUsageDescription: Bubbles uses your health data to show your partner your activity.
infoPlist.NSCalendarsUsageDescription: Bubbles shares your calendar status with your partner (e.g., 'in a meeting').
